amendment.description: To clarify the deadline for the reporting requirement relating to the establishment of a Jordan Enterprise Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 97 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 97 proposed by Senator Risch. (consideration: CR S830; text: CR S830) To clarify the deadline for the reporting requirement relating to the establishment of a Jordan Enterprise Fund.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 97 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 97 proposed by Senator Risch.
